meanings.sent1: The hospital presterilizes all surgical equipment before each operation.
meanings.sent2: It is important to presterilize the bottles before filling them with milk.
meanings.sent3: The chef presterilizes the cooking utensils to ensure a clean kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The sun's heat presterilizes the water in the desert, making it safe to drink.
meanings.sent5: The scientist presterilizes the petri dishes to prevent contamination in the lab.

meanings.sent1: The presterilized bandages are ready to be used in case of an emergency.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check if the tools are presterilized before performing the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The presterilized gloves give the doctors peace of mind during procedures.
meanings.sent4: The presterilized environment of the laboratory ensures accurate test results.
meanings.sent5: The presterilized room smelled of disinfectant, assuring cleanliness.
